english: I call myself / My name is
to get to know (for the first time)
please / here you go / you're welcome / come in
I'm starting to understand the Polish language
to know one another / to be versed in
I ask / please / here you go

polish: W życiu trzeba sobie radzić, jak powiedział rolnik wiążąc buty glizdą
english: You have to get through life somehow, said the farmer tying his shoes with a worm
I wish you all the best

polish: ząb zupa ząb, dąb zupa dąb
